CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, pg. 23 reads: "Courier's Pittsburgh Home Service Fair...10. NATIONAL MERCHANTS - David Watson, national representative of the Pepsi-Cola Company, reminds audience to buy Pepsi-Cola as William Clyde Page, national promotion manager and director of Courier Home Service Fairs, listens. A portion of the sparkling Crosley kitchen used by Mrs. Handy may be seen...All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Five piece band performing with trumpet, saxophone, drums, bass, and possibly Walt Harper playing piano, next to stage with display kitchen with Morton Salt and McCormick Vanilla advertisements in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Musical instruments--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Musicians--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
